About the Product:
Kickstart your day with a strong cup of Emperia Aura Instant Coffee. Emperia Aura blend is a mix of Robusta & Arabica coffee beans and chicory (30%). The coffee beans are perfectly roasted and processed to ensure the Rich taste and aroma are locked. Awaken your senses each morning and go about your busy schedule smoothly.
Ingredients:
Coffee Beans, Soluble Coffee Powder
How to Use:
Mix 1 tsp of Emperia Aura Coffee with piping Hot Water (50 ml).
Add the sweetener of your choice and mix well.
Add the desired quantity of hot milk and enjoy or add more hot water to enjoy black coffee.

About the Product:
Relish the taste of Emperia Classico 100% pure instant coffee. Emperia Classico 100% Pure coffee blend is a mix of high-quality Robusta (70%) and Arabica (30%) coffee beans. The coffee beans are slowly roasted, extracted and converted into coffee powder in order to retain the aroma and taste. Sip on a flavourful and aromatic cup of Emperia Classico to start a fresh new day.
Ingredients:
Coffee Beans, Soluble Coffee Powder
How to Use:
Mix 1 tsp of Emperia Classico Coffee with piping Hot Water (50 ml).
Add the sweetener of your choice and mix well.
Add the desired qty of hot milk and enjoy or add more hot water to enjoy black coffee.

About the Product:
Brooke Bond Red Label is one of India's largest selling packaged tea brands. The CTC tea is made using the best quality leaves, processed in the unique Brooke Bond Tea Excellence Centre. Since 1869, Brooke Bond has brought you the perfect tasting tea experience with the best-chosen leaves. It was in 1903 that Brooke Bond launched Red Label. That is when Brooke Bond Red Label created one of India's most favourite beverages, chai. Every cup of Red Label is brewed with the best-chosen tea leaves that ensure your tea has strength, rich colour, and a refreshing taste. We believe our tea has the taste of togetherness that gives it that perfect taste, colour, and irresistible aroma. Red Label is all about coming together over a warm cup of tea.It stands for making the world a more welcoming place with Swad Apnepan ka (Taste of Togetherness). Brooke Bond Red Label stands for inclusiveness and for making the world a better place one cup at a time. Enjoy the great tasting range from Red Label Core and Red Label Natural Care, which has a mix of 5 Ayurvedic ingredients, namely Tulsi, Ashwagandha, Mulethi, Ginger, and Cardamom. Red Label Natural Care is clinically proven to enhance immunity and to help you fall ill less often.
Storage:
Please store the tea in a dry airtight container in a cool, dry place after opening the pack.

About the Product:
Bisleri is one of the most popular brands for bottled water. Bisleri follows a six-step stringent purification process which means that the water from Bisleri is pure and absolutely good for your health. Even the bottles where the water is stored are made in Bisleri plants as well to avoid contamination. A bottle of Bisleri water contains calcium, chlorides, magnesium and TDS; all of which are absolutely essential for healthy well-being. Quench your thirst with this bottled water and it will go down real smooth. Water like food sustains life and the promise of bisleri is all you need.
Composition:
Ozonated water, Minerals (Magnesium Sulphate, Potassium Bicarbonate)
Benefits:
The best thing about consuming mineral water is that it has no calories and no fat.If you are trying to lose weight, then you should curb your daily intake of aerated drinks and increase the amount of mineral water which will keep the body hydrated and healthy.Known as a great source of sulphates, mineral water helps in the digestion process as well.

Bisleri Mineral Water is definitely one of the healthiest kinds of bottled water and drinking it can enhance your well-being. This water is rich in minerals such as magnesium, calcium and iron. Benefits:

One of the active Composition magnesium is known to lower blood pressure level; people suffering from hypertension will notice a decrease in blood pressure over a period of time. Mineral water is known to be quite effective for a healthy beauty regime. You can use it for cleansing, moisturizing or toning the skin of the face to add a healthy glow. How to Use:

About the Product:
When the history of tea is written down, 1966 will be a celebrated chapter. For in that year, Brooke Bond Taj Mahal Tea was born with a promise - to foster excellence in each cup. Fifty years on, we have not forgotten that promise. Ordinary teas usually provide either strength or just flavour. However, only Brooke Bond Taj Mahal Tea contains the precious essence of the finest fresh tea leaves, giving you the perfect balance of strength and flavour. A flavour which can only be matched by the exquisite melodies composed by the maestros who have been our ambassadors over the decades. Rigour in selection and blending. The tea from every tea estate has its own taste - because of its terroir, pluck, and flush. How then do we turn it all into the unique Taj experience for our customers - year after year? Enter our master tasters and blenders and their traditions built over many years. It takes millions of tastings and years of experience to be a taste for Taj Mahal Tea. The brew is golden orange in colour, has a rich taste, and an uplifting aroma. So go ahead, savour the flavour of this historic blend, and enjoy the perfect taste of this priceless cup of tea and exclaim- Wah Taj! Taj Mahal Teas are tasted, graded, and perfectly blended at the Brooke Bond Tea Excellence Centre. Taj Mahal tea comes in a unique Flavour Lock pack. A cup of Taj Mahal tea invites you to cheer your senses. The perfect balance of strength and flavour. Blended since 1966. Also available in teabags.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Start your day bright with Nescafe Sunrise! It all starts with handpicked beans from coffee farms in South India. These coffee beans are slow roasted to develop the perfect aroma, which is retained using our world-class expertise and captured in rich aroma granules. Enjoy the great aroma and taste in every cup with Nescafe Sunrise.

Simply follow the instructions on the back of the pack and mix the coffee granules with hot water, sugar, and milk to release the rich aroma in your cup every morning.Storage Recommendation: Do store the instant coffee powder in a cool, dry, and hygienic place. about_the_product:
About the Product:
Nescafe Sunrise is an instant coffee-chicory mixture made from 70% coffee powder and 30% chicory. This instant coffee is made with the fine blends of Arabica and Robusta coffee beans from the farms of South India. These beans are slow roasted in rotating drum roasters till they develop the perfect aroma. Nestles world-class technology then ensures this aroma is retained all through the coffee-making process and finally capture in aroma granules. This soluble coffee is easy to use, ensuring coffee-making doesn't seem like an inconvenience. So, rise up to the awakening taste and rich aroma of Nescafe Sunrise coffee and let new opportunities come to you.The Nescafe Plan: We are committed to using sustainable processes in our coffee production and taking care of our planet by introducing better farming techniques. Nescafe works directly with 1,70,000 coffee farmers every year and helps them grow better quality, delicious coffee which leads to an increase in their income.
Ingredients:
Coffee Beans (70%) & Chicory (30%).

Nescafe Sunrise instant coffee-chicory mixture is made from blends of 70% coffee and 30% chicory.It is slow roasted for a richer aroma.Our world-class technology ensures that the aroma is retained throughout the coffee-making process and captured in rich aroma granules.

Start your day bright with Nescafe Sunrise! It all starts with handpicked beans from coffee farms in South India. These coffee beans are slow roasted to develop the perfect aroma, which is retained using our world-class expertise and captured in rich aroma granules. Enjoy the great aroma and taste in every cup with Nescafe Sunrise.
Ingredients:
Coffee Beans (70%) & Chicory (30%).
Features:
Enjoy great aroma and taste in every cup with Nescafe Sunrise.This instant coffee-chicory mixture is a blend of 70% coffee and 30% chicory that provides an irresistible experience.Made with handpicked beans from coffee farms in South India, Nescafe Sunrise offers an exquisite blend of Arabica and Robusta coffee beans.Delight your senses every morning with the rich taste and aroma of Nescafe Sunrise coffee.Also try: Nescafe Classic Coffee, Nescafe Gold.
Storage and Uses:
Simply follow the instructions on the back of the pack and mix the coffee granules with hot water, sugar, and milk to release the rich aroma in your cup every morning.Storage Recommendation: Do store the instant coffee powder in a cool, dry, and hygienic place. To ensure lasting freshness, transfer the contents into an airtight container. Always use a dry spoon.

From the Brand:
About the Product A glass of coconut water a day keeps the doctor away. fresho! brings you a refreshing experience with a bottle of natural tender coconut water. Quench your thirst and enlighten your body with goodness. Leave the mess and fuss of popping open a tender coconut. You can just open the cap and sip the delicious sweetness whenever you please. It’s a perfect option to hydrate yourself while working out when at the office or travelling. Explore fresho!'s full range of Juices Syrups Concentrates and enjoy.
Benefits:
Rich in vitamins, minerals, and electrolytes.Boosts your energy when you feel tired or dehydrated.Excellent alternative for fruit juices.Coconut water contains natural sweetness thus one can avoid calories from added sugar.Great for skin health.Promotes overall well-being.

Remove the cap, rupture the seal, and drink it up. You can use coconut water to make delicious mocktails. Squeeze a slice of lemon into the coconut water to reduce body heat. Storage Information: Store in clean, dry, hygienic conditions.

About the Product:
Bru Instant Coffee was launched in 1968 and was India's first coffee-chicory mix instant coffee. It is the perfect mix of 70% coffee and 30% chicory and is made from a fine blend of the choicest plantation and Robusta beans. These coffee beans are first roasted to perfection. The new and enhanced process ensures that the fresh coffee aroma is preserved, so that you get a rich coffee taste beyond compare. Bru Instant coffee can be used to make an aromatic cup of hot coffee as well as a refreshing glass of cold coffee. With Bru Instant, you can now discover a great coffee experience with your loved ones.About Bru: A part of Hindustan Unilever Ltd. Bru Coffee is India's largest and favourite coffee brand that offers a wide variety of coffee products. Since 1968, Bru has been a pioneer in bringing the authentic taste of coffee to Indian consumers. The best coffee beans are selected from across innumerable coffee trails and are freshly roasted to serve a great cup of rich irresistible coffee. Bru has four distinct offerings - Bru Instant and Bru Gold in Instant coffee, Bru Green Label and Bru Select in Filter coffee. Bru-ed with love and blended with passion, Bru Coffee celebrates authenticity in coffee and relationships.
Storage:
Transfer contents into an air-tight container and store in a cool, dry & hygienic place.
How to Use:
Take 1 tsp of Bru Instant Coffee in a cup.Add 100 ml milk and/or water and some sugar to taste.Stir well and enjoy a great tasting cup of Bru Instant.

About the Product:
Horlicks is a Malt based food Drink that has nutrients to support immunity. Horlicks is clinically proven to increase lean tissue, making children “stronger”. Helps improve attention and concentration to make your child sharper. Horlicks is clinically proven for more haemopoietic nutrients in the blood to improve the levels of blood related nutrients (Vitamin A & Folate) in circulation. Horlicks is clinically proven to increase fat-free mass, making child stronger*OLD

about_the_product:
About the Product:

About the Product:
To elevate your coffee experiences, Nescafe, the world's favourite instant coffee brand, presents a rich and aromatic coffee in the form of Nescafe Classic. The unmistakable flavour of Nescafe Classic is what makes this signature coffee so beloved worldwide. Start your day right with the first sip of this classic 100% pure coffee and let the intense taste and wonderfully refreshing aroma of Nescafe instant coffee awaken your senses to new opportunities. With over 75 years of experience and collaboration with coffee farmers to help them cultivate more sustainable coffee through improved crop techniques, we deliver the best coffee produced by the best selection, roasting, and blending methods.
How to Use:
To make your perfect cup, use 1 tsp (1.5g) of Nescafe Classic Coffee, 1 tsp (7 g) of Sugar, and 1 cup (120 ml) of hot milk or water (not boiling). Simply follow the instructions on the back of the pack and mix the coffee powder with hot water or milk to get your own cup of premium instant coffee right at home. Storage Recommendation: Upon opening, transfer the contents of the pack into an airtight container. Always use a dry spoon.
Features:
Start your day right with the first sip of this classic that awakens your senses to new opportunities. Premium frothy instant coffee right at home; a must-try for all coffee-lovers. Made using specially selected and carefully roasted beans to create a captivating coffee experience. 100% pure coffee that is perfect for any time of the day. Transfer the contents into an airtight container to ensure lasting freshness. Organic: NoContact us on 1800 103 1947

About the Product:
Aquafine Bottled Water is filtered to provide you with incredible quality of 100% pure drinking water. It is your perfect companion for happy bodies everywhere. Aquafina goes through a five-step state-of-the-art purification process to give consumers pure water and perfect taste. About the Product:
Bournvita Chocolate Nutrition Drink is a scientifically designed formula, crafted by nutritionists with a bundle of nutrients that are known to support Physical strength (Calcium, Vitamin D and Magnesium are known to maintain Bone and Muscle strength); Mental Strength (Iron, Iodine and Zinc which help in normal cognitive functions); Immune strength (Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Zinc and Iron to support the immune functions). Bournvita chocolate drink to be consumed as a part of a daily balanced diet and stronger lifestyle.

product_desc: Blend Instant Coffee Powder - Festive Edition- Rich & Smooth
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Nescafe brings you the premium choice for your special cup of coffee every day, rising above all to the highest standards set by coffee connoisseurs. This premium imported roast is artfully crafted to achieve a quality coffee experience that will awaken your senses. Nescafe Gold is a sophisticated, aromatic coffee with a rich, well-rounded taste that creates delicious moments instantly. It brings out the very best from Nestle’s high-quality Arabica and Robusta beans to create a rich and smooth soluble coffee powder. Nescafe’s commitment to quality goes well beyond the product. They help coffee farmers and minimize environmental impact at every step.
Ingredients:
Blend Of Robusta And Arabica Coffee Beans
How to Use:
Usage: Prepare with boiling milk or water. Add sugar to taste.
Storage: Store the product in a cool, dry and hygienic place. To ensure lasting freshness, close the lid tightly after every use. Always use a dry spoon.
Features:
Premium imported soluble coffee powder for a distinctive coffee experience.
Made with choicest Robusta and Arabica beans for a smooth taste.
Indulge your senses in a truly distinctive premium coffee blend with Nescafe Gold.
Specially designed glass jar keeps your Nescafe Gold delightfully tasty to the last drop.
Imported from South Korea.

How to Use:
Add 2 spoons of coffee powder put to the upper part of the filter.
Place the plunger on the bed of coffee powder.
Add 120 ml of hot boiling water to the plunger.
Keep it undisturbed for 10 to 12 min. Wait till the decoction percolates to the lower chamber.
Add decoction to the boiled milk and desired amount of sugar. A piping hot cup of filter coffee is served with a frothy layer on the top.

About the Product:
Tata Tea Kanan Devan offers a robust cup of tea. Tata Tea Kanan Devan is the second most popular tea brand in Kerala and one of the largest brands in Karnataka in the loose tea segment. Kanan Devan was well-liked as a loose tea brand for over seven decades and was then introduced in 1984 as a packaged tea brand in Kerala. It was later expanded to Karnataka, Goa, and Tamil Nadu. Since then, Kanan Devan has been a key brand of the Tata Tea portfolio. It is pure and natural tea. In addition to the regular Classic version, the brand also offers Tata Tea Kanan Devan Strong for consumers who prefer a stronger cup of tea and Tata Tea Golden Leaf, a premium leaf offering from Kanan Devan that delivers a superior taste and aroma.
How to Use:
Bring fresh water to a boil and add a pinch of tea leaves. Add milk and sugar as per taste.

product_desc: Coconut Water - Refreshing Flavour, Vital Electrolytes
about_the_product:
About the Product:
The sweet taste of nature’s coolest hydrant is reminiscent of many evenings at the beach. We’d have just enough money for one treat. After a sweaty evening filled with activities like running and playing ball, the whole bunch of cousins, elder ones being in charge, of course, would invariably end up at their favourite nariyal pani wala who would help us pick the sweetest coconuts (it’s still a mystery to me how they can always tell those ones apart). To think that all these years later, we still pick a nariyal pani to cool down on a hot summer day, that says a lot about our allegiance to this natural coolant. Sadly there’s not as much playtime anymore but as long as there’s coconut water, all we got to do is shut our eyes and be transported, giggles, laughter and all.
Ingredients:
Coconut Water (99%), Sugar And Preservative (Nisin).
Features:
No added colours, this food is by its nature is gluten-free.
How to Use:
Ready to drink.

About the Product:
Introducing Tata Coffee Grand Filter Coffee which leverages the deep heritage of Tata in coffee and delivers an intensely rich, fresh, and aromatic coffee. Get a fresh start to your mornings with a sip of freshly brewed coffee and be ready for an adventurous ride all day long. Containing coffee, chicory and flavour locked decoction crystals, this coffee is roasted and grounded to perfection.
Ingredients:
Roast & Ground Filter Coffee
How to Use:
Add 2 tsp of coffee into the upper portion of the filter and cover with the retainer. 
Add 50ml hot water into the upper portion of the filter and cover it. 
Wait for 15mins for the decoction. 
Mix with hot milk and sugar as per taste.
Benefits:
Filter Coffee: Get a memorable coffee experience with a perfect cup of filter coffee. 
This is a freshly roasted and grounded Tata Coffee Grand Filter Coffee. 
Perfect Blend: Filter coffee chicory mix which is a blend of flavour locked decoction crystals and agglomerated coffee for an amazing cup. 
Rich Aroma: Delivers an intensely sophisticated, fresh and aromatic taste to please all coffee lovers. 
Also Try: Try Tata Coffee Grand Instant Coffee for an instant fresh brew. 
Commonly Searched Topics: coffee, filter coffee powder, filter coffee, Tata coffee, Tata coffee grand, Tata coffee powder.

About the Product:
Tata Tea Premium was launched in 1985, pioneering the packet tea revolution in India by bringing fresh teas directly from the garden to consumers in poly packs that retain the freshness of the teas. Tata Tea Premium understands the regional tea taste preferences of consumers and offers blends to cater to them. This is why Tata Tea Premium is one of the largest tea brands in India and truly 'Desh ki Chai'. Tata Tea Premium's social awakening communication platform, Jaago Re, inspires and facilitates real change in on-ground social issues plaguing the country, and has been a critical driver towards cementing Tata Tea Premium's position as one of the leading tea brands in India.

About the Product:
Pure, unprocessed, and untouched Himalayan Natural Mineral Water originates in the upper reaches of the Himalayan mountains just for you. Every drop of this pure and natural drinking water travels through layers of rock, sand, and silt for around 20 years and is then packed for you to drink. It is naturally enriched with minerals such as magnesium, sodium, and calcium, and has the perfect pH balance. HimalayanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s unique mineral composition gives it a characteristic taste and is packaged in a premium, instantly recognizable bottle. This makes it a great meal accompaniment and instantly elevates the dining experience. People who love the finer things in life do not just enjoy Himalayan with their meals at fine restaurants but also make it their brand of choice at home. It is one of the most consumed natural mineral waters in the finest homes across the country. Experience the taste of Raw, Rare, Remarkable with Himalayan.
Features:
Natural & Pure: Himalayan Natural Mineral Water is filtered through layers of Himalayan rock, gathering the richness of minerals and salts along the way.Naturally rich in Minerals: It contains naturally occurring minerals such as magnesium, sodium, calcium, potassium, and more. Certified by Institut De Fresenius, Germany.Also try: Try Himalayan Sparkling and Himalayan Still Water. About the Product:
Drive away all your Monday blues and turn your Fridays into Friyays with Maaza mango drink. Synonymous with the very spirit of mangoes, Maaza® lets you enjoy moments of carefree indulgence. This mango drink is universally loved for its taste, colour, thickness and wholesome properties. Made from real mango pulp of hand-picked real Alphonso mangoes, this ready-to-serve fruit drink offers a fulfilling experience down to the last sip. Whether it’s about bringing the joy of mango to your celebrations, enjoying a yummy escape on crazy hectic days, turning frowns upside down and opening up hearts, Maaza is your go-to drink for life’s little moments. It is every mango lover’s first choice, so if you are a mango lover too, then just simply sit, unwind and enjoy aam ka magic in every sip.

About the Product:
Horlicks is a health drink that contains nutrients to support immunity. Horlicks is clinically proven to improve 5 signs of growth and to make kids taller, stronger, and sharper. It is also scientifically proven to enhance the power of milk. Horlicks is now available in four exciting and delicious flavours: Classic malt, Chocolate, Elaichi, and Kesar Badam. Enjoy with a cup of hot milk or a glass of cold milk. Horlicks is a leading force in the â€˜Science of Foodâ€™ and has bio-available nutrients, meaning nutrients that are more available for growth. These get absorbed in the blood and are carried to all parts of the body.Horlicks contains 9 nutrients (Vit B6, B12, C, D, Copper, Folic Acid, Iron, Selenium, and Zinc) which are scientifically proven to support immunity. It increases the density of minerals such as calcium in bones to give children bigger and stronger bones. Horlicks is clinically proven to increase lean tissue, making children 'stronger' and helps improve attention and concentration to make your child sharper. It is also clinically proven for more haemopoietic nutrients in the blood, resulting in 'healthier blood', referring to improvement in the levels of blood health-related nutrients (Vitamin A & Folate) in circulation. Horlicks is clinically proven to increase fat-free mass, making children stronger.

Horlicks is India's #1 Nutrition Drink that helps kids be Taller, Stronger, Sharper. Horlicks is also available in Chocolate delight flavour. For over 150 years, Horlicks has stayed true to its original purpose of providing high-quality, wholesome nutrition. Made with the goodness of milk, wheat, and barley, and fortified with 27 vital nutrients. Regular intake of Horlicks with daily diet helps in children’s growth and development like better bones, more muscles and improved concentration scores. Horlicks is clinically proven to make kids Taller, Stronger, Sharper! Calcium, Phosphorus, Magnesium & Vitamin D supporting height gain – Taller. Protein & Potassium supporting healthy bones and muscles – Stronger. Vitamin B9, B12, Iron, Iodine & Zinc supporting attention & concentration – Sharper. Vitamin A, E, C, Copper & Selenium to support immunity. For your favourite cup of Horlicks, just take 200 ml of hot or cold milk or water, add 3 spoons (27 g) of Horlicks, stir briskly, and enjoy! This iconic drink has been a household name for over a century, synonymous with nourishment and wellness. Today, Horlicks stands as a beacon of nutritional goodness, cherished by generations across the globe.

About the Product:
It's not just a cup of tea; it's therapy - One Sip at a Time. Lipton Green Tea is not just a regular cup of tea; we believe it's therapy for your body. Wake up to a morning cup of hot Lipton green tea and feel how it leaves you feeling light and active. Awaken your senses - one sip at a time. Buy Now! Magic of Green Tea Green tea is produced when freshly plucked leaves are heated, rolled/cut, and then dried. The catechins in the fresh leaves are preserved during the green tea process, making green tea rich in catechins. Also, green tea is typically drunk without milk and sugar, and hence gives zero calories as compared to the ordinary tea made with milk and sugar. Available in a range of flavours, Lipton offers a range of different flavours to ensure that you are offered variety and enjoyment while drinking tea. Lipton flavours some of its teas with added natural flavours, and no artificial flavours are used. You may try Lipton Green tea in Pure Light (unflavoured), Tulsi Natura, Honey Lemon, and Lemon Zest flavours as well, available in pack sizes of 10s and 25s teabags. Next best to water, brewed unsweetened Lipton Green Tea, being 99.5% water, is a great way to meet your daily required fluid intake. Staying hydrated is essential to ensure bodily functions are carried out efficiently.
Benefits:
Based on literature, having 7-8 cups/day (600 mg catechins) for 8-12 weeks helps reduce waist circumference.
How to Use:
Place a tea bag in a cup. Pour boiling water into the cup. Dip the tea bag 2-3 times and allow it to infuse for 2 mins. Remove tea bag. Best enjoyed as a light brew without milk and sugar.

About the Product:
It's not just a cup of tea; it's therapy - One Sip at a Time. Lipton Green Tea is not just a regular cup of chai; we believe it's therapy for your body. Wake up to a morning cup of hot Lipton green tea and feel how it leaves you feeling light and active. Awaken your senses - one sip at a time. Buy Now! Magic of Green Tea Green tea is produced when freshly plucked leaves are heated, rolled/cut, and then dried. The catechins in the fresh leaves are preserved during the green tea process, making green tea rich in catechins. Also, green tea is typically drunk without milk and sugar and hence gives zero calories as compared to the ordinary chai made with milk and sugar. Available in a range of flavours, Lipton offers a range of different flavours to ensure that you are offered variety and enjoyment while drinking tea. Lipton flavours some of its teas with added natural flavours, and no artificial flavours are used. You may try Lipton Green tea in Pure Light (unflavoured), Tulsi Natura, Honey Lemon, and Lemon Zest flavours as well, available in pack sizes of 10s and 25s teabags. Lipton is the world's number 1 tea brand*. In India, Lipton is about connected wellbeing that encourages you to grab every fitness opportunity. Lipton carefully selects the best quality tea from the Rainforest Alliance and Trustea** certified tea gardens and offers a range of teas from packet tea to tea bags, which includes Lipton Green tea and Darjeeling tea.
How to Use:
Place a Lipton green tea bag in a cup, pour freshly boiled water into the cup, dip the tea bag a few times and allow it to infuse for 2 mins, remove the teabag and dispose of it in a wet bin, best enjoyed as a light brew without milk and sugar. Best enjoyed as a light brew without milk and sugar.

About the Product:
Enjoy the superior taste of hand-picked litchis! The sweet, refreshing taste makes it a great ready-to-serve fruit beverage. A healthy addition to your daily breakfast. Did You Know? Litchi was first cultivated as early as 1700 BC. They are known to be an excellent source of vitamins and minerals. The one treasure that easily transforms Indian summer into the festivity that it is, is Aamras. An honest treat for an honest day’s work. Sometimes enveloped in rotis, sometimes guzzled with milk but the best way to go about Aamras is to have it directly as-is. The way the ancients intended. Without preservatives or artificial flavour. Nutri-Pull System for Better Absorption of Nutrients: PediaSure is a nutritional drink for kids, which contains the Nutri Pull system that acts like a magnet to attract key nutrients like calcium, iron, and zinc to support their absorption. 
Supports Longer Stronger Bones: Contains advanced growth nutrients like Arginine and Vitamin K2 to support longer, stronger bones during crucial years of growth. 
For Height, Weight Gain: PediaSure, as a Nutrition Drink for kids, is formulated with advanced growth nutrients Arginine, Vitamin K2, High-Quality Protein, Calcium, Vitamin D, Iron, Iodine to support catch-up growth. 
11 Immunity Nutrients: Contains Zinc, Selenium, Copper, Vitamin A, C, E to maintain immunity, reduce sick days in children. 
Promotes Brain Development: PediaSure offers to be the best nutrition powder for child growth as it provides neuro nutrients like Linoleic Acid, Alpha Linolenic Acid, Choline, Taurine, Magnesium, Biotin to support brain development.

About the Product:
Made from the finest lemons sourced from Brazil, Dabur Hommade Lemoneez makes your job easier and faster. One bottle (250ml) of Dabur Hommade Lemoneez is equivalent to the juice of 33 lemons. Made from 100% fresh lemon extract, Dabur Hommade Lemoneez is absolutely pure and safe. Our Hommade range is an inspiration for seasoned cooks, experimental folks who like to try cooking and aspiring chefs-to-be.
Ingredients:
Water, Lime Juice, Lemon Juice Concentrate. Contains Permitted Class II Preservative (INS 224).
How to Use:
The closest and one of the best substitutes of real Lemons, Dabur Hommade Lemoneez can be used to make a variety of drinks as well as vegetarian & non-vegetarian dishes.
Features:
1. Our Hommade Lemoneez bottle is equivalent to extract of 33 lemons. 2. This product contains natural Lemon & lime juice extracts. 3. 2 tbsp of Hommade Lemoneez is equivalent to the juice of 1 Lemon, make sure you use in recipes accordingly. 4. Speaking of recipes, it is great to be used in mocktails, nimbu paani & various veg/non-veg dishes.  5. Freshest ingredients always - the taste of Hommade!

About the Product:
During summer, there is barely a home in western India, be it Gujarat or Rajasthan, that doesn't partake in the festivity that is Amaras. Sometimes, they have it with milk, sometimes rotis and if time and patience allow, they even make sweets out of it. But the best way to go about Amaras is to have it directly as-is. The way the ancients intended. Without preservatives or artificial flavour. Without frills or hassles. An honest treat for an honest day’s work. A silken amaras cascading down your throat - soothing, serenading and more importantly, lingering. To remind you that the mango is indeed the true king of the fruit realm. And that we cannot help but submit to its tasty tyranny.

Ready to drink.

About the Product:
Horlicks Diabetes Plus is a nutritional beverage that has been designed for Indian adults. It is scientifically formulated to support the dietary management of at-risk and diabetic individuals. It contains high fibre (22% of dual blend fibre - Fibersol-2 and Nutriose). Research has shown that a diet rich in fibre helps reduce glucose and lipids in the blood. Horlicks Diabetes Plus is high in protein and contains 16 vital nutrients. These fibres are known to promote satiety and reduce calorie intake. Soluble dietary fibre taken as a part of the diet contributes to the reduction of blood cholesterol levels. The beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of a minimum of 3 g of soluble dietary fibre. Horlicks Diabetes Plus is not intended to replace any existing medication. It is a nutritional beverage to be consumed as a part of a balanced daily diet and exercise. Journal of Diabetes and Metabolism; 2020 Feb; 11(2): 841. Nutriose is a registered trademark of Roquette FrÃ¨res Nutriose and Fibersol-2 are trade names for Wheat fibre dextrin & Corn fibre dextrin respectively. Horlicks Diabetes Plus contains artificial sweetener and is for calorie-conscious individuals. Food for Special Dietary Use - food for helping manage blood glucose. Contains naturally occurring sugars. This contains Acesulfame Potassium. Not recommended for children.
How to Use:
1. Take 200 ml of hot milk or water. Add 30 g (Approx.2 levelled scoops) of Horlicks Diabetes Plus.2. Stir quickly to mix well. Recommended serving: 30 g once a day.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Manna Nutrition Mix is made with the traditional wisdom of millets and blended to perfection with 14 bowls of cereal, pulses, and nuts to give a nourishing breakfast for your family. It is packed with the goodness of natural multigrain without any preservatives, artificial colours and added sugar. It helps boost stamina and bones in growing children. It is also ideal for growing children as it is easy to digest. This Nutrition Mix is also beneficial for pregnant women and breastfeeding mothers.
Ingredients:
Millets and Cereals: 82% (Ragi, Bajra, Corn, Jowar, Wheat, Red Rice, Barley) Pulses:12% (Bengal Gram, Green Gram), Sago, Nuts 2% (Groundnut, Almond, Cashewnuts) Cardamom.
How to Use:
Take 30g(3 tbsp) of Manna Nutrition Mix. Stir with 300ml(1 1/4 cups) water or milk, so no lumps are formed. Place on stove and bring to boil, stir continuously for 3 minutes to avoid lumps. Add sugar or honey to taste.  Serve warm. Variation: Cook with water and serve with thick buttermilk and salt.

About the Product:
Continental Malgudi Filter Coffee is made from a blend of 60% coffee and 40% chicory. It is a perfect way to enjoy traditional filter coffee. The coffee is roasted and ground in an authentic manner. A simple solution that helps you make the perfect filter coffee. Just open this pack and mix it with whole milk to enjoy the perfect cup of nostalgia. It does not contain any added preservatives, colour, or artificial flavours. This smooth coffee mix is an excellent way to kick-start the day. It is easy to make without any hassle.
How to Use:
1. Add 2 tablespoons of Malgudi Coffee Powder to the top of the filter. 2. Fill it with 50 ml of hot water and cover it. 3. Let it brew for 15 minutes.4. Pour the decoction and hot milk into a cup and add sugar to taste. 5. Transfer coffee from one cup to another for perfect froth and serve hot.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Ensure Diabetes Care is the leading diabetes-specific nutritional supplement drink worldwide, offering a unique scientific formula to assist in managing blood sugar, weight, and heart . This scientifically formulated nutrition has been clinically proven in Indian patients. With 36 essential nutrients, including proteins, vitamins, fibre, minerals, and MUFA-rich fat blend, slow-release carbs, it promotes heart while effectively managing blood glucose. Designed as a complete, balanced nutrition for individuals with diabetes, it ensures steady energy throughout the day while helping to regulate blood glucose levels. Additionally, this drink provides high protein content, supporting muscle crucial for strength and mobility, along with vital vitamins and minerals.

Take 200 ml of water, and add 6 scoops of Ensure Diabetes Care as directed.

About the Product:
Vedica Natural Mountain Water comes to you in all its untouched purity, right from its source. Gushing from an aquifer with intense pressure, the natural mountain water is pushed above the ground surface to a height of 5 meters above ground level, powerfully and consistently. The underground geological origin guarantees that there is no external Contamination since the mouth of the water source is covered by rocks on all sides. Besides, being naturally fortified with silica, the spring is naturally free from any Microbial infection or pollution. Vedica Natural Mountain Water is also low on sodium, making it the perfect choice for the health-conscious. It has a high proportion of sulphates, which work as natural detoxifying agents. And its clear, sweet taste proves that it is free of calcium carbonate and magnesium carbonate salts, which give some mineral waters a chalky taste. Scientifically put, the Total Dissolved Solids in Vedica Natural Mountain Water is225mg/ltr. It is also high in sulphates, the natural detoxifying agents. Ensuring that all you get with Vedica Natural Mountain Water is the sweet taste of purity.

About the Product:

Lipton Darjeeling Tea ensures you an artisan cup of 100% pure Darjeeling black tea; with its distinctive long tea leaves and the carefully preserved aroma of delicate floral and fruit undertones. About the Product:
Picked in the height of Northern India, this superb single region tea from Lipton offers a truly individual taste. Lipton Darjeeling Tea ensures you an artisan cup of 100 per cent pure Darjeeling black tea with its distinctive long tea leaves and the carefully preserved aroma of delicate floral and fruit undertones. As its long leaves gently unfurl in boiling water, Lipton Darjeeling tea delivers a reddish-brown brew with a distinctive aroma and rare flavour. About the Product:
A well-mixed fruit juice brings together the best qualities of different fruits while retaining a unique taste of its own. Your kid will love the stand-alone tangy-sweet taste of Real Mixed Fruit and will always ask for more. Make it a daily habit for him, because he might be fussy with fruit salads and cut fruits, but would never say no to the invigorating taste of Real Mixed Fruit. Every time you pour him a glass of Real Mixed Fruit, you can be sure that only the best Real Fruit Power would reach him. That is because every glass of Real Mixed Fruit is loaded with the goodness of 9 nutritious fruits, namely Passion Fruit, Apricot, Mango, Banana, Pineapple, Guava, Orange, Apple and Lime. Isn't that great? The lushness of 9 fruits in 1 pack not only gives you all the nutrition but also makes you feel recharged. It is this unmatched combination of unique taste and super nutrition that makes Real Mixed Fruit, one of the highest-selling fruit beverages in the country. Besides, it can also be used in the preparation of one of the most refreshing summer drinks known as the Mixed Fruit Punch. It is an amazingly made, healthy blend of fresh fruits, packed with much energy. Its great taste is very filling and full of health benefits. So, relish your meals with the Real Mixed Fruit.
Ingredients:
Water, Concentrated Mixed Fruit Juice (12.03%), [ From Apple, Orange, Guava, Apricot, Mango, Banana, Lime, Passion Fruit, Pineapple], Sugar, Acidity Regulator (Ins 330), Antioxidant (Ins 300), Stabilizer (Ins 440), Colours [Ins 160 A (Ii) & (Iii)] And Flavours (Natural & Natural Identical Flavouring Substance).

About the Product:
Red Bull Energy Drink - Wings when you need them. Red Bull Energy Drink is a functional beverage, and its formula contains high-quality ingredients: Caffeine, Taurine, some B-group Vitamins, Sugars, and Alpine water. Vitalizes Body and Mind. Red Bull cans are made of 100% recyclable aluminium. Red Bull is appreciated worldwide by top athletes, busy professionals, university students, and travellers on long journeys. Red Bull produces a variety of energy drinks in both sugar and sugar-free varieties. 350 ml Red Bull Energy Drink cans.
Features:
What's Inside The Can: Caffeine: Caffeine was already known by ancient civilizations. They consumed it from natural sources like tea, coffee, cacao beans, and cola nuts and appreciated its stimulating effects on the human body. Taurine: Taurine is an amino acid naturally occurring in the human body and present in the daily diet. It is involved in a wide range of biological processes. B-group vitamins: Vitamins are essential micronutrients that are required for maintaining normal body functions. B-group vitamins play an important role in energy metabolism, such as the build-up and breakdown of carbohydrates and protein. Sugars: Red Bull Energy Drink is made with sugar sourced from sugar beets. Alpine Water: Naturally, water is the main ingredient of Red Bull. Sustainability: Red Bull is very aware of its environmental responsibility and is constantly striving for improvement. Red Bull has made a conscious decision to use 100% recyclable aluminium cans, and we developed our Red Bull Coolers, which use up to 45% less energy than conventional fridges.

About the Product:
Boost is one of India’s leading Malt-based foods fortified with a combination of micro-nutrients that are known to be essential for oxygen utilization of the body and energy metabolism. Boost is clinically proven to increase stamina by 3 times (3X) more. Enjoyed by some of your favourite cricket superstars all over India, delicious chocolate Boost drink can be prepared with hot or cold milk and is fortified with 17 essential vitamins and minerals. Boost is proven to be a Nourishing beverage that helps build stamina. Boost Has nutrients which help in maintenance of optimal bone & muscle strength. Boost is Enriched with Envita Nutrients (Iron, Vitamin A, C Folic Acid B12 and B6). Envita nutrients help transport oxygen more effectively in the body. Nutrients present in boost nourish the body in multiple ways- Iron and Vitamin C- help in effective transportation of oxygen to muscle. Vitamin B12 Vitamin B2 Vitamin B6, Folic Acid- In the presence of oxygen muscles produce more energy. Boost has nutrients which help in optimal utilization of oxygen. Vitamin D Calcium and protein- Nutrients which help in maintenance of optimal bone & muscle strength for strength. Vitamin B1, Niacin, Biotin, Pantothenic Acid, Iodine, Magnesium. Energy releases nutrients which help release energy from food.

product_desc: Junior Horlicks Nutrition Drink - Vanilla Flavour, 2 To 6 Y
product_USP: Nutrition For Toddlers & Young Kids for Supporting Growth
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Junior Horlicks is one of India's leading nutritional Cereal-based drinks for toddlers in the age group of 2-6 years. It contains nutrients that help support brain development growth & immunity in toddlers & pre-schoolers. Junior Horlicks is tailor-made for your little fussy eaters and helps in completing their A to Z Nutrition. Two cups of Junior Horlicks contain 85% RDA of Iron 75% RDA of Vitamin C and 64% RDA of Calcium for your toddler.* - Physical Growth: Junior Horlicks contains nutrients such as Calcium|| Vitamin D, Vitamin K1 & Proteins that are known to support physical growth & development - Immunity: When children step out into new environments they must have a strong immune system.
Junior Horlicks contain nutrients that are known to support immune function like Zinc, Selenium, Copper  Vitamin E and Vitamin A. - Brain Development: Key brain functions develop during the early years. Junior Horlicks contains nutrients like Iron, Choline, and Vitamin B6 Iodine that are known to support brain development and function. Junior Horlicks is available in Vanilla & Chocolate variants|| which can be enjoyed with a glass of cold or hold milk or hot water to support your child's A to Z nutrition along with daily food. * Nutrient Requirements and Recommended Dietary Allowances for Indians
Ingredients:
Wheat Flour (Atta), Malted Barley (Extracted Solids) (25%), Milk Solids (22%), Cereal Extract (8%) [Barley, Malted Barley, Millet, Wheat], Sugar, Minerals, Wheat Gluten, Vitamins, Edible Iodized Salt, Acidity Regulator [INS 501 (ii)], Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) powder from Schizochytrium sp. (0.26%), Nature Identical Flavouring Substance, Soy Protein Isolate
Features:
Specialized nutrition food for fussy toddlers (2 to 6 years age group)
Junior Horlicks is a nutritional beverage that as part of a diet helps meet your child's nutritional requirement
Nutrients such as Calcium, Vitamin D, Vitamin K1 & Protein that are known to support physical growth & development
With Iron, Folic Acid & Iodine to support optimal brain development
Helps improve immunity with nutrients like Vitamin C, E, A, Zinc, Selenium and Copper
With goodness of wheat and milk to meet your child's nutritional requirement
Storage and Uses:
Store in a clean and dry place away from sunlight. The refill pack inside is specially made to seal in all the freshness of your product. To make sure it stays fresh|| empty the contents into an airtight container as soon as you open the refill pack.1. Take 200ml of hot or cold milk. 2. Add 23 g (approx 2-3 heaped spoonful) of Junior Horlicks while stirring to remove lumps. Recommended twice a day.

100 % Coffee Beans

About the Product:
Growing up, this scaly fruit fascinated all of us. A magic fruit that’s hard from the outside but super soft on the inside, is a fruit but could easily pass for a dessert. Yup! That’s Lychee for you! While the taste of lychee was hard not to love, peeling it was a total mood kill. Being the baby of the family we would get away with a lot of things and lychee-peeling ceremony was definitely one of them. 
 Eating lychees while sitting around in our night suits post dinner. Maa peeling at this tropical wonder with an extra fan (vintage, fished out from storage) pointed in our direction is how I shall forever remember childhood summers. The sweet, fleshy fruit still evokes that same sense of happy, lazy summer nostalgia in me. Thank God for juice though, no pleading about peeling necessary!
Ingredients:
Water, Lychee Pulp (40%), Sugar, Stabilizers (Carboxy Methyl Cellulose And Guar Gum), Antioxidant (Ascorbic Acid) And Acidity Regulator (Citric Acid). Contains Added Flavours (Natural And Nature-Identical Flavouring Substances).
Features:
No added colours, no preservatives, full of love and igredients bits, this food is by its nature is gluten-free.
How to Use:
Ready to drink.
Other Product Info:

About the Product:

About the Product:
Bones form the structural framework of the human body. Up until the age of 30, bone formation is faster than bone loss, which causes the skeleton to grow both in size and density, resulting in an overall increase in bone mass. After the age of 30, bone mineral density may start to decrease. Unfortunately, there are no visible signs of weak bones. They often go unnoticed over many years, with no symptoms or discomfort until a bone breaks. To maintain strong bones, you don’t just need an adequate intake of Calcium, but also Vitamin D for Calcium absorption and Vitamin K2 for binding Calcium to bones, daily. Remember, Vitamin K2 is not commonly found in the Indian diet, and Vitamin D is not even available in your daily diet. Horlicks Women’s Plus is a bone nutrition specialist powered with CALSEAL formula. It provides 100% RDA^ of Calcium, Vitamin D & Vitamin K2 requirements. NIH Osteoporosis and related bone diseases national resource center (https://www.bones.nih.gov/health-info/bone/bone-basics). Ref: Malhotra N and Mithal A. Osteoporosis in Indians. Indian J med res 127, March 2008, pp 263-268 Unique combination of Vitamin K2, Calcium and Vitamin D to support bone health. In 2 serves (60 g) as per ICMR 2010 Guidelines on Women. Added sugar refers to Sucrose. 'CONTAINS NATURALLY OCCURRING SUGARS'. Horlicks Women’s Plus is a nourishing beverage to be consumed as a part of regular diet.
Features:
Calseal Formula|Bone Nutrition Specialist|Nutrients For Strong Bones|100% Rda Of Calcium, Vitamins D & K2|Clinically proven~ to help improve bone strength in 6 months|No Added Sugar

About the Product:
Now refresh, rejuvenate, and relax with Tetley. Introducing Tetley Masala Chai, which indulges you in the refreshing flavours of spicy masala. The first sip will overwhelm you with a spicy mix of our renowned Masala flavour. The next sip will delight you with the full-bodied robustness and rich taste of our unique Assam blend. Before you know it, you're enveloped in the lip-smacking bliss that comes with the perfect cup of Masala chai. It's that little moment when our spicy Masala collides with our finest Assam tea to bring a touch of magic to your day. Tetley is available in a variety of black tea flavours, including Tetley Original, Lemon Twist, Elaichi, Ginger Zing, Darjeeling, and English Breakfast.
Features:
REFRESHING TEA: Tetley Masala Chai gives a feeling of refreshment at every sip. FINEST ASSAM TEA: Enjoy the rich taste of our finest Assam tea. SPICY MASALA FLAVOUR: Each sip will overwhelm you with a spicy mix of our renowned masala flavour. ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY TEA BAGS: Our tea bags are plastic-free and biodegradable. Easy to make. ALSO TRY: Try Tetley Original, Lemon Twist, Elaichi, Ginger Zing, Darjeeling & English Breakfast tea.
How to Use:
Place the teabag in a cup. Pour freshly boiled water into the cup. Brew the tea bag for about 2 minutes or until you get the desired colour. Remove the teabag. Drink it as black tea or add milk. Masala flavoured tea is best had with milk and sugar.

About the Product:
Horlicks Lite is a specialized adult nutrition drink that caters to the unique nutritional requirements of active adults aged 35 and above. Horlicks Lite with no added sugar contains high-quality protein that helps in cell maintenance and repair, which is essential for maintaining a healthy body. Moreover, Horlicks Lite is free from added sugars and cholesterol, making it a perfect fit for older adults. About Horlicks Lite:Nutrition designed for Active AdultsHorlicks adult contains essential nutrients like Vitamin C, Vitamin D, and Zinc that are known to support the optimal functioning of the immune system, promoting a healthy body.Lite Horlicks is with no added sugar.It contains six antioxidant nutrients, like Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vitamin B2, Zinc, Selenium, and Copper, which protect cells from oxidative stress, ensuring the body's overall well-being. Horlicks Lite is a nutrition drink for adults is designed to support the healthy lifestyle of active adults and provides a maximum shelf life of 12 months. Add three heaped teaspoonfuls (25g) of the powder to 200ml of cold or hot milk or water to prepare your nourishing Horlicks Lite drink. Stir quickly to mix well and enjoy Horlicks Lite. It is available in 2 tasty flavours – Regular Malt & Badam

About the Product:
The search for the perfect mixed fruit juice ends here. B Natural has all the elements to make for a classic Mixed Fruit Juice, one that has the right balance of the juiciest fruits, maintains consistency and incredible nutritional value. Allow yourself to experience this delicious concoction of delicious and juicy fruits like mango, banana, pineapple, guava, jamun and bael. Relish the goodness of fruit and fibre as it has been squeezed into each pack of B Natural. Crafted using 100% fruit pulp, 0% concentrate and no added preservatives, B Natural Mixed Fruit juice offers an authentic fruit experience. B Natural ensures complete fruit nutrition for you and your family as it is packed with fibre and Vitamin C & E. This natural fruit juice serves as the perfect start to a busy day or as the perfect in-between drink to rejuvenate you when low on energy. Treat yourself to the genuine fresh and juicy flavours with every sip of B Natural Mixed Fruit.

About the Product:
B Natural Mixed Fruit Dry Fruits juice is an absolute winter delight, filled with the richness of dry fruits and the nutrition of fresh fruits. The process of making B Natural fruit beverages does not use the additional step of concentration, which involves heating the Pulp to remove water content. about_the_product:
About the Product:
Ensure Diabetes Care is the leading diabetes-specific nutritional supplement drink worldwide, offering a unique scientific formula to assist in managing blood sugar, weight, and heart . This scientifically formulated nutrition has been clinically proven in Indian patients. With 36 essential nutrients, including proteins, vitamins, fibre, minerals, and MUFA-rich fat blend, slow-release carbs, it promotes heart while effectively managing blood glucose. Additionally, this drink provides high protein content, supporting muscle crucial for strength and mobility, along with vital vitamins and minerals.

Take 200 ml of water, and add 6 scoops of Ensure Diabetes Care as directed.

product_USP: No Added Preservatives, No Added Colours
about_the_product:
About the Product:
An apple a day keeps the doctor away might just be the main mantra of the Indian parent's handbook, no? Which kid wasn't raised with sermons on how one must eat apples for health? It's a good thing that this biblical fruit is juicy, tasty and fulfilling or else we really have a bone to pick with our parents. Growing up we had a family joke, that no matter what time of the day you tell mom youre hungry she has a standard response, apple khaa lo. In fact, we reached a point where we would ask her just for this automated response and then giggle away to glory. In our household, apples were not just the breakfast fruit, however, because we made warm apple pies and trifle pudding with apple pieces regularly. The unsung hero of fruits, it truly was versatile and is the family's go-to snack option to this day!
Ingredients:
Water,
Apple Puree Concentrate (11.15%),
Sugar,
Acidity Regulator (Malic Acid),
Stabilizers (Carboxy Methyl Cellulose, Guar Gum And Pectin) And Antioxidant (Ascorbic Acid).
Contains Added Flavours (Natural And Nature-Identical Flavouring Substances).
Equivalent To 34% Apple Juice Content.
Features:
No colours, no preservatives, the food is by its nature gluten-free.
Storage:
Store in clean, dry hygienic conditions away from direct sunlight.
Refrigerate and consume within 24 hours of opening

product_desc: Millet Chocolate - Rich In Calcium, Protein & Iron
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Millet chocolate Horlicks is designed to address this very challenge of nutrition not being tasty and resolve the tension around nutrition between the mother and the child. Millet chocolate Horlicks is made with the traditional wisdom of millets that each millet has its own importance e. g. : finger millets are full of calcium, sorghum has Potassium and phosphorus, and foxtail is fibrous and thus you need a mix of millets and not just one. That is why millet chocolate Horlicks is made with the goodness of multi millets like Pearl millet, Finger millet, Foxtail millet and Sorghum. 
This multi-millet is hidden in the yummy taste of chocolate, making the kids absolutely love the taste and finish their glass of millet without any fuss. Millet chocolate Horlicks is a  food drink that can be consumed either with milk or water, along with the regular diet. It doesn, t need cooking; it is easy to prepare and ready to consume. It is ideal for either hot or cold consumption. When consumed with milk, it not only enhances the flavour of milk but also ensures that your child gets additional nutrition from millet and has a great start to their day.
Ingredients:
Cereal Extract (34%) [Barley, Malted Barley (11%), Wheat], Sugar, Millets (17%) [Pearl Millet (Bajra) (8%), Finger Millet (Ragi) (3%), Foxtail, Millet (Kanngani) (3%), Sorghum (Jowar) (3%)], Milk Solids (8%), Cocoa Powder (6. 5%), Wheat Gluten, Minerals, Soy Protein Isolate, Partially Hydrolysed Cereal Solids, Emulsifier (INS 471), Liquid Glucose, Natural Colour (INS 150c), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances, Vitamins, Stabiliser (INS 412), Edible Iodized Salt, Acidity Regulators [INS 501(ii), INS 500(ii)].
How to Use:
Take 200 ml of hot or cold milk. 
Add 27 g (Approx. 3 heaped spoonfuls) of Horlicks. 
Stir quickly to mix well

Red Bull is appreciated worldwide by top athletes, busy professionals, university students, and travellers on long journeys. Red Bull produces a variety of energy drinks in both sugar and sugar-free varieties. Twenty Four (24 Pack) 250 ml Red Bull Sugar-free Cans |
Features:
What's Inside The Can: Caffeine: Caffeine was already known by ancient civilizations. They consumed it from natural sources like tea, coffee, cacao beans, and cola nuts and appreciated its stimulating effects on the human body. Taurine: Taurine is an amino acid naturally occurring in the human body and present in the daily diet. It is involved in a wide range of biological processes. B-group vitamins: Vitamins are essential micronutrients that are required for maintaining normal body functions. B-group vitamins play an important role in energy metabolism, such as the build-up and breakdown of carbohydrates and protein. Sugars: Red Bull Energy Drink is made with sugar sourced from sugar beets. Alpine Water: Naturally, water is the main ingredient of Red Bull. Sustainability: Red Bull is very aware of its environmental responsibility and is constantly striving for improvement. Red Bull has made a conscious decision to use 100% recyclable aluminium cans and we developed our Red Bull Coolers which use up to 45% less energy than conventional fridges. |

About the Product:
Protinex Diabetes Care is a vegetarian ready-to-serve nutritional formulation for people with diabetes. It is a scientifically designed nutrition supplement with high protein and high fibre. Take a cup of lukewarm or cold milk. Add 2 tbsp. of this supplement. Mix well and drink.

About the Product:
Bones form the structural framework of the human body. Up until the age of 30, bone formation is faster than bone loss, which causes the skeleton to grow both in size and density, resulting in an overall increase in bone mass. After the age of 30, bone mineral density may start to decrease. Unfortunately, there are no visible signs of weak bones. They often go unnoticed over many years, with no symptoms or discomfort until a bone breaks. To maintain strong bones, you don’t just need an adequate intake of Calcium, but also Vitamin D for Calcium absorption and Vitamin K2 for binding Calcium to bones, daily. Remember, Vitamin K2 is not commonly found in the Indian diet, and Vitamin D is not even available in your daily diet. Horlicks Women’s Plus is a bone nutrition specialist powered with CALSEAL formula. It provides 100% RDA^ of Calcium, Vitamin D & Vitamin K2 requirements. NIH Osteoporosis and related bone diseases national resource centre (https://www.bones.nih.gov/health-info/bone/bone-basics). Ref: Malhotra N and Mithal A. Osteoporosis in Indians. Indian J med res 127, March 2008, pp 263-268 Unique combination of Vitamin K2, Calcium and Vitamin D to support bone health. In 2 serves (60 g) as per ICMR 2010 Guidelines on Women. Added sugar refers to Sucrose. 'CONTAINS NATURALLY OCCURRING SUGARS'. Horlicks Women’s Plus is a nourishing beverage to be consumed as a part of regular diet.
Ingredients:
Cereal Extract (46%) [Barley, Wheat, Malted Barley, Wheat Malt], Milk Solids (37%), Maltodextrin, Minerals, Edible Iodized Salt, Nature Identical Flavouring Substances, Vitamins, Non-Caloric Sweetener (INS 950). Allergen Information: Contains Wheat, Barley & Milk. May Contain Traces of Soy.
Features:
Calseal FormulaBone Nutrition SpecialistNutrients For Strong Bones100% Rda Of Calcium, Vitamins D & K2Clinically proven~ to help improve bone strength in 6 monthsNo Added Sugar

Storage:
Once opened, transfer contents into an airtight container and store in a cool, dry, and hygienic place.
How to Use:

Transfer the coffee mixture from one cup to another for perfect froth and serve hot.

product_desc: Nutritional Drink Mix - Creamy Vanilla Flavour
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Protinex Vanilla Delight is a vegetarian ready-to-serve beverage mix that helps bridge the gap of nutrients from the diet of Indian Adults. Protinex Vanilla Delight is an adult nutritional drink mix that is clinically proven to provide 34% higher immuno boosters that help build immunity. Protinex contains 22 essential vitamins and minerals including 10 immuno nutrients that help support immunity, build strength, and provide energy. Protinex consists of nutrients that help in building bone strength, growth, maintenance of muscle mass, improving metabolism, the formation of blood cells, and maintaining fluid, electrolyte balance. Available in vanilla flavour, Protinex easily makes its place in your everyday diet plan, and with zero added sugar* and low fat, it is suitable for daily consumption. It can be taken with milk or water.
Ingredients:
Skimmed milk powder, Maltodextrin, Soy protein isolate, Minerals (Di calcium phosphate, Ferric pyrophosphate, Zinc sulphate, Potassium iodide), Nature identical flavouring substances, Stabilizer (Guar gum), Vitamins (Choline bitartrate, Ascorbic acid, dl-alpha tocopheryl acetate, Nicotinamide, Retinyl acetate, Ergocalciferol, Thiamine hydrochloride, Calcium pantothenate, Riboflavin, Pyridoxine hydrochloride, Folic acid, d-Biotin), Sweetener (Sucralose).
How to Use:
Take a glass (200 ml) of lukewarm or cold milk. 
Add 3-4 heaped tablespoons (35 g) of Protinex Vanilla Delight. 
You may add sugar to taste and stir.

About the Product:
It's not just a cup of tea; it's therapy - One Sip at a Time. Lipton Green Tea is not just a regular cup of tea; we believe it's therapy for your body. Wake up to a morning cup of hot Lipton green tea and feel how it leaves you feeling light and active. Awaken your senses - one sip at a time. Buy Now! Magic of Green Tea Green tea is produced when freshly plucked leaves are heated, rolled/cut, and then dried. The catechins in the fresh leaves are preserved during the green tea process, making green tea rich in catechins. Also, green tea is typically drunk without milk and sugar, and hence gives zero calories as compared to the ordinary tea made with milk and sugar. Available in a range of flavours, Lipton offers a range of different flavours to ensure that you are offered variety and enjoyment while drinking tea. Lipton flavours some of its teas with added natural flavours, and no artificial flavours are used. You may try Lipton Green tea in Pure Light (unflavoured), Tulsi Natura, Honey Lemon, and Lemon Zest flavours as well, available in pack sizes of 10s and 25s teabags. Next best to water, brewed unsweetened Lipton Green Tea, being 99.5% water, is a great way to meet your daily required fluid intake. Staying hydrated is essential to ensure bodily functions are carried out efficiently.
How to Use:
Place a Lipton green tea bag in a cup, pour freshly boiled water into the cup, dip the tea bag a few times and allow it to infuse for 2 mins, remove the teabag and dispose of it in a wet bin. Best enjoyed as a light brew without milk and sugar.

product_desc: Nutrition Drink - Chocolate Flavour, 2 To 6 Y
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Junior Horlicks is one of India's leading nutritional health drinks for toddlers in the age group of 2-6 years. It contains nutrients that help support brain development, growth, and immunity in toddlers and pre-schoolers. Junior Horlicks is tailor-made for your little fussy eaters and helps in completing their A to Z Nutrition. Two cups of Junior Horlicks contain 85% RDA of Iron, 75% RDA of Vitamin C, and 64% RDA of Calcium for your toddler. - Physical Growth: Junior Horlicks contains nutrients such as Calcium, Vitamin D, Vitamin K1, and Protein that are known to support physical growth and development. - Immunity: When children step out into new environments, they must have a strong immune system. Junior Horlicks contains nutrients that are known to support immune function like Zinc, Selenium, Copper, Vitamin E, and Vitamin A. - Brain Development: Key brain functions develop during the early years.
How to Use:
Take 200 ml of hot or cold milk. Add 23 g (approx 2-3 heaped spoonful) of Junior Horlicks while stirring to remove lumps. Recommended twice a day.
Features:
Specialized nutrition food for fussy toddlers (2 to 6 years age group) Junior Horlicks is a nutritional beverage which as part of a diet helps meet your child's nutritional requirement. Nutrients such as Calcium, Vitamin D, Vitamin K1, and Protein are known to support physical growth and development. With Iron, Folic Acid, and Iodine to support optimal brain development. Helps improve immunity with nutrients like Vitamin C, E, A, Zinc, Selenium, and Copper with the goodness of wheat and milk to meet your child's nutritional requirement.

product_desc: Select Tender Coconut Water/Nariyal Paani - No Added Sugar, 100% Refreshing
about_the_product:
About the Product:
We all can agree that coconut water is the coolest drink one can have on any given day. It’s naturally refreshing, keeps your body hydrated, and tastes amazing. But the only problem is, that carrying a coconut can be a bit inconvenient. But you don't have to worry, we've got you covered. Introducing the all-new B Natural Select Tender Coconut Water, the same natural taste of your favourite ‘Nariyal Paani’ now in an easy-to-carry PET bottle. The best part is that this drink has no added sugar or artificial flavours. Its all-natural taste is sure to make you feel great with every sip that you take. Now you can carry this loved and refreshing drink with you anywhere you want. Feeling thirsty? Just open a bottle of B Natural Select Tender Coconut Water and enjoy its refreshing taste.
Ingredients:
Water (90.5%), Concentrated Tender Coconut Water (9.5%), Minerals, Preservatives (INS 202, INS 224, INS 234) and Natural Flavours and Natural Flavouring Substances. Reconstituted Tender Coconut Water. Contains Sulphite. May Contains Milk, Nut, Soy.

product_desc: Green Tea - Immune With Added Vitamin C, Classic
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Tetley Green Tea is undoubtedly an excellent source of anti-oxidants. All the goodness now comes with immunity power of added Vitamin C with new Tetley Green Tea Immune Range. While anti-oxidants help cleanse your body from within, Vitamin C helps support your body’s immune system. This green tea with no calories provides many more benefits like boosting fat metabolism, helping to stay hydrated and helping to feel light and active. Driven by sustainability, these green tea bags are 100% plastic-free and staple-free. The classic green tea contains 100% natural flavors. # A cup of green tea contains as much as 5 times (5X) the anti-oxidants in an apple. (‘USDA Database for the Flavonoid Content of Selected Foods’, Rel 3.3 March 2018)
Features:
Green tea now comes with the Immunity power of Vitamin C
Rich in Anti-Oxidants: Provides 5X anti-oxidants as an apple*
Goodness of Vitamin C: Contributes to immune defence by supporting various functions of the immune system, each cup provides 8 mg of Vitamin 
Benefits of Green Tea: Boost fat metabolism, helps to detox, good for hydration, helps feel light & active
100% plastic-free and staple-free tea bags
Rejuvenating Green Tea: Classic flavour of green tea to ensure rejuvenation in every sip
Try Our Range of Refreshing Variants: Tetley Lemon & Honey, Ginger, Mint & Lemon and Mango
Country of Origin: India
How to Use:
Bring fresh water to boil.
Green tea is best made with water at 85.
Pour water into cup.
Place one teabag and allow it to brew for about 2 mins.
Remove the teabag.
Sweeten with honey or sugar as desired.
Green Tea is best had without milk.

product_desc: SipNDigest - With Green Tea, Ginger, Tulsi & Rock Salt, Spiced Green Tea Bags
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Introducing Lipton After Lunch Green Tea, a soothing blend of green tea with real, power-packed ingredients—ginger, tulsi and rock salt. All of these are traditionally known to improve metabolism and aid in digestion, helping you feel light after meals. This balanced blend is an ideal post-meal companion. Overindulged and need to fight post-meal sluggishness? Pour yourself a cup of Lipton After Lunch Green Tea. Green Tea is known for several benefits. Green tea is produced when freshly plucked leaves are heated, rolled/cut and then dried.
The catechins in the fresh leaves are preserved during the green tea process, making green tea rich in catechins. Also, green tea is typically drunk without milk and sugar and hence gives zero calories as compared to ordinary chai made with milk and sugar. Brewed, unsweetened Green Tea being 99% water is a great way to meet your daily required fluid intake. Green tea is also a great source of flavonoids. Consumption of flavonoid-rich foods fits into a heart-healthy diet Lipton after lunch offers you all these green tea benefits mixed with the goodness of ginger, tulsi and rock salt. These ingredients are traditionally known for their beneficial properties and soothing effects. Best had 1-hour post meals.
Ingredients:
Green Tea, Spice Mix (Ginger, Tulsi, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Acidity Regulator - 330, Carom, Clove, Nutmeg, Asafoetida, Cumin), Rock Salt
How to Use:
1. Place a Lipton Green Tea bag in a cup and pour boiling water.
2. Dip the tea bag for 2-3 mins in the cup.
3. Remove the teabag and enjoy.

About the Product:
Continental Malgudi Filter Coffee is made of a blend of 80% coffee and 20% chicory. It is a perfect way to enjoy traditional filter coffee. The coffee is roasted and ground in an authentic way. A simple solution that helps you make the perfect filter coffee. Just open this pack and mix it with whole milk to enjoy the perfect cup of nostalgia. about_the_product:
About the Product:
Manna Nutrition Mix is 100% Natural Nutrition for Growing Kids. Manna Nutrition Mix is made with a mix of grains and pulses roasted to enhance flavours. It is blended with nuts and cardamom, ground and packed hygienically, to help you make a nourishing drink for your child every day! In the formative years (2-6), it is advisable to give natural foods without preservatives, additives, and artificial flavours to your growing kids.
Ingredients:
Millets, Cereals: 82% Ragi, Bajra, Corn, Jowar, Wheat, Red Rice, Barley Pulses: Fried Gram, Green Gram. Sago, Groundnut, Cardamom, Almonds, And Cashewnuts 100% Nature And Organic
How to Use:
1. Take 3 tbsp (30g) of Manna Nutrition Mix and stir with 1 and 1/4 cups (300ml) of water or milk, so no pumps are formed. 
2. Place on stove and bring to boil, stir continuously for 3 minutes to avoid lumps. 
3. Add sugar or Honey and serve warm. 
Variation: Cook with water and serve with thick buttermilk.

product_desc: Mother's Plus Nutrition Drink - Vanilla Flavour
about_the_product:
About the Product:
The right nutrition during pregnancy is important for the mother’s health and baby’s growth and the mother’s daily diet alone may sometimes not be sufficient. Trusted for over 2 decades|| Horlicks Mother’s Plus is scientifically designed to provide tailor-made nutrition for pregnancy and lactation. It contains 25 vital nutrients that are important to provide the nutrition for the mother’s health and baby’s growth. It contains 100% RDAs^ of Vitamin B2|| Vitamin B12 and Vitamin C during pregnancy and 100% RDAs^ of Folic acid and Iron during lactation. During the first 6 months|| a new born baby1 is dependent on the mother’s milk to derive nutrition. Therefore it is important that the new mother gets enough amount of nutrients to meet the baby’s needs in addition to her own requirements . Horlicks Mother's Plus contains micronutrients (Iron|| Iodine|| Folic Acid|| Zinc|| Magnesium|| Vitamin A, B6, B12 Vitamin D and protein) that are known to support healthy birth weight. It also contains DHA and Choline known to support Brain Development and micronutrients like Vitamins B1,B2,B6,B12,A,D; Iodine and Selenium which are known to help improve the quality of breast milk .Horlicks Mother's Plus contains 50% RDAs^ of Immunity supporting nutrients like Vitamin A, E,B6 and Selenium. Horlicks Mother's Plus is a nutritional beverage to be consumed as a part of daily diet 1exclusively breastfed.

Milk Solids (75%), Dietary Fibre (Wheat Dextrin), Edible Fat powder [High Oleic Sunflower Oil, Corn Solids, Sodium Caseinate, Emulsifier (INS 471), Antioxidant (INS 305)], Cereal Extract, Minerals, Vitamins, Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) powder from Schizochytrium sp. (0.51%), Edible Vegetable Oil (Palm Kernel oil), Natural Flavour, Nature Identical flavouring substances, Natural Colour [INS 100(i)], Allergen Information: Contains Wheat, Barley and Milk. May contain traces of Soy.
Features:
Scientifically Designed Nutrition For Pregnancy And Lactation | 25 Vital Nutrients | Protein For Healthy Birth Weight | Dha For Brain Development | No Added Sugar | Contains Micronutrients (Vitamin B1|| B2|| B6|| B12||A;Selenium & Iodine ) Which Are Known To Improve The Quality Of Breast Milk
How to Use:
1.Take 200 ml of hot or cold, milk or water. Add 20 g (Approx. 2 heaped spoonfuls) of Horlicks Mother’s Plus 2. Stir quickly to mix well. Recommended Serving: 20 g, 3 times a day

product_desc: Nutritional Beverage Mix - Rich Chocolate Flavour
about_the_product:
About the Product:
The New, Improved Protinex Rich Chocolate is a vegetarian nutritional beverage mix that should be consumed daily as part of a  lifestyle for your everyday . It is now clinically proven for strength and energy. It increases your strength and energy nutrients by 34%. With a rich legacy of over 65 years, Protinex comes with high protein content (34g for every 100g) that helps you fight tiredness + fatigue and delights you with its rich, creamy taste! Lack of protein leads to loss of muscle strength which in turn leads to frequent tiredness and fatigues in our daily lives. 
Protein makes up about 50% of muscles, bones in our body and our body cannot store protein – hence it needs to be consumed daily! Protinex helps in bridging this gap of protein and other essential nutrients in regular Indian Adult diets. Protinex should be consumed daily as part of a  lifestyle for everyday . Protinex Rich Chocolate is also enriched with calcium, vitamin D, and immuno-nutrients for your everyday  helping with stronger muscles, bones, long-term immunity and stamina to power through each day.
Ingredients:
Skimmed Milk Powder, Malt Extract, Soy Protein Isolate, Cocoa Powder, Minerals (Di Calcium Phosphate, Ferric Pyrophosphate, Zinc Sulphate, Potassium Iodide), Nature Identical Flavouring Substances, Maltodextrin, Stabilizer (Guar Gum), Vitamins (Choline Bitartrate, Ascorbic Acid, Dl-alpha Tocopheryl Acetate, Nicotinamide, Ergocalciferol, Thiamine Hydrochloride, Calcium Pantothenate, Riboflavin, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Folic Acid, D-biotin), Sweetner (Sucralose)
How to Use:
Approx. 28 servings per pack; Serving Measure - 35g, take a glass( 200 ml) of lukewarm or cold milk and add 2-3 heaped Tablespoon( 35g) of Protinex, Stir/Shake it well, enjoy.

product_desc: Coffee - Dhivyam Premium, Coarse Ground Filter Coffee
about_the_product:
About the Product:
South Indian Coffee, also known as Filter Coffee is a sweet milky coffee made from dark roasted coffee beans (70%-80%) and chicory (20%-30%), especially popular in the southern states of Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka, Kerala and Tamil Nadu. The most commonly used coffee beans are Peaberry (preferred), Arabica, Malabar and Robusta grown in the hills of Kerala, Karnataka, Kodagu Chikkamagaluru and Tamil Nadu - Nilgiris District Yercaud Kodaikanal.
Outside India, a coffee drink prepared using a filter may be known as Filter Coffee or as Drip Coffees the water passes through the grounds solely by gravity and not under pressure or in longer-term contact.
Ingredients:
Dark roasted coffee beans(Peaberry (preferred), Arabica, Malabar and Robusta), Chicory.
How to Use:
1. Add 2 tsp of coffee powder in the upper portion of filter and spread it uniformly.
2. Add 50 ml of hot boiling water into the upper portion of filter and cover it.
3. Wait 25 minutes for the decoction.
4. Mix decoction with hot milk and add sugar to taste.

About the Product:
It's not just a cup of tea, it's therapy - One Sip at a Time. Lipton Green Tea is not just a regular cup of tea; we believe it's therapy for your body. Wake up to a morning cup of hot Lipton green tea and feel how it leaves you feeling light and active. Awaken your senses - one sip at a time. Buy Now! Magic of Green Tea Green tea is produced when freshly plucked leaves are heated, rolled/cut, and then dried. The catechins in the fresh leaves are preserved during the green tea process, making green tea rich in catechins. Also, green tea is typically drunk without milk and sugar and hence gives zero calories as compared to the ordinary tea made with milk and sugar. Available in a range of flavours, Lipton offers a range of different flavours to ensure that you are offered variety and enjoyment while drinking tea. Lipton flavours some of its teas with added natural flavours, and no artificial flavours are used. You may try Lipton Green tea in Pure Light (unflavoured), Tulsi, Natura, Honey Lemon, and Lemon Zest flavours as well, available in pack sizes of 10s and 25s teabags. Next best to water, brewed unsweetened Lipton Green Tea, being 99.5% water, is a great way to meet your daily required fluid intake. Staying hydrated is essential to ensure bodily functions are carried out efficiently.
How to Use:
Place a Lipton green tea bag in a cup. Pour freshly boiled water into the cup. Dip the tea bag a few times and allow it to infuse for 2 mins. Remove the tea bag and dispose of it in a wet bin. Best enjoyed as a light brew without milk and sugar.

About the Product:
Assam is one of the finest teas in the world. The deep-amber colour and bold taste ensure that it is the perfect companion throughout the day. There are only two places in the world where tea plants are native. Assam in northeast India is one of them. We've been sourcing tea from gardens on the flood plains of the Brahmaputra River for generations and that ensures you learn a thing or two, like which leaves give the best flavour. That's how we know our Assam contains only the best. Our Assam leaves aren't picked until June because that's when they start making the best-tasting tea. Off-peak is just not the same. Stout structure, malty piquancy and a deep amber glow. The exclusive character of Assam’s finest is unmistakable. Cultivated near or at sea level, the full-bodied taste and heady aroma of our Classic Assam Tea are best enjoyed with a faint sprinkle of your favourite spice.
